        <div class="videoSummaryWrapper">
         <div class="videoSummary" id="ctl00_CenterColumnPlaceHolder_divSummary">
          <p>
           This video shows you how to make tried-and-true Wisconsin bratwurst. Fresh brats start out on the stovetop, simmering in a large pot full of beer, butter, and sliced onions. Then they take a quick trip to the grill for a little browning session. Serve on hoagie rolls with, onions, stone-ground mustard, and, if you like, a little warm sauerkraut. Its the taste of Wisconsin in the summer. Watch the video, then get Bob Codys top-rated recipe for
           <a href="http://allrecipes.com/Recipe/Wisconsin-Bratwurst/Detail.aspx?src=VD_Summary">
            Wisconsin Bratwurst
           </a>
           . A little polka music on the side is recommended but not required.
           <em>
            <a href="http://allrecipes.com/videos/16639/sausage/main.aspx?src=VD_Summary">
             See more sausage videos &gt;&gt;
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
